ns2:testcase.ns3:title: FS-TD-005/PSA-TD-002-032/Ability to maintain the frequency and term based on the current frequency and term if the user changes from a single maturity CD to an automatic renewal CD/Positive
ns2:testcase.ns3:description:
System must have the ability to maintain the frequency and term based on the current frequency and term if the user changes from a single maturity CD to an automatic renewal CD
Success Criteria : System has the ability to maintain the existing frequency and term based of the account after the renewal, if the user changes from a single maturity CD to an automatic renewal CD.
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: v070382

ns2:relatedChangeRequest.summary: 19478: Parameter for single Maturity is not Set up at Product Level and Account Amend Screen is not working as expected.
